definition: easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
see 易如反掌[yi4 ru2 fan3 zhang3]

sentences.english: The Research and Application of User Interface in CAID System;
sentences.chinese: 用戶界面旋鈕型的直觀且易於使用。

sentences.english: The reason is easy to divine.
An easy to use collaborative environment for editing and running features. There is already RubyMine and LowDown, but I have some different ideas myself.
sentences.chinese: 提供易於使用的協助環境來編輯和運行相關功能。

sentences.english: Extendibility is the ease of adapting software products to changes of specification.
sentences.chinese: 擴充性是指易於修改軟件以適應規格變化。

sentences.english: The identifications of equipments and their components should be easy to trace.
sentences.chinese: 材料和設備散件的標識應易於進行跟蹤。

sentences.english: And this product is easy to apply pre-cure process for cleaning and rework.
sentences.chinese: 而其在預固化後易於清洗返工。

sentences.english: Dyco's Easy Loader is designed to easily lift and load Plastic Film Rolls.
sentences.chinese: 迪柯的裝載機易於擡起和輸出塑料菲林膠片。

sentences.english: It has an easy mounting solution thanks to the optional wall-mount arm.
sentences.chinese: 它有一個易於安裝的解決方案由於可選的壁掛式手臂。

sentences.english: In addition, the stack tray can be easily dried since single deck thickness is reduced.
sentences.chinese: 另外，層疊式托盤降低了單層厚度，易於乾燥。

sentences.english: Cases with clockwise horizontal plane T loop may easily suffer from cardiac neurosis.
sentences.chinese: 環順轉者易於發生心臟神經官能症。

sentences.english: The features of this method are: simple preparative procedure, reproducible yield and easy control of monoalkylation.
sentences.chinese: 此法操作簡單，產量穩定且易於控制在一烴基化階段。

sentences.english: It can be easily used with freshing touch, non greasy, protect the skin with favorable moisturizing effect.
sentences.chinese: 雖爲乳霜，卻出人意料地易於塗抹，觸感清爽不油膩。

sentences.english: We only need a easy-to-handle but completed platform.
sentences.chinese: 我們只需要一個易於處理，但完成的平臺。

sentences.english: Liners are easy to replace which is beneficial to improve running rate.
sentences.chinese: 襯板易於快速更換，提高了作業率。

sentences.english: The method is simple in calculation and easy-to understand.
sentences.chinese: 該方法計算簡單，易於理解。

sentences.english: This approach makes the databases self-contained and easier to manage.
sentences.chinese: 這種方法讓數據庫實現自包含，並且使之易於管理。
